features.featureTitle: Update the image in the “About Our Practice” section (the at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) to use the user-uploaded photo instead of the current placeholder image, while keeping the existing aspect-square layout, rounded corners, border, and shadow styling.
